subheader: Επιλέξτε μια συνδρομή που ταιριάζει στις ανάγκες σας και να χρηματοδοτήσει την ανάπτυξη της Crafty ταυτόχρονα!
craftyBotInformation: Το Crafty bot είναι ένα προηγμένο Minecraft εστιασμένο Discord bot. Βρείτε περισσότερες πληροφορίες στο

emerald.color: Προσαρμοσμένο χρώμα έμφασης για τη σελίδα του διακομιστή & του παίκτη
emerald.access: Ειδική Emerald πρόσβαση στο Discord του Crafty
emerald.serverTracking: Access to 1 Minecraft server tracking slot
emerald.dmCommands: Ability to use commands in direct messages
emerald.notifications: Receive notification when Minecraft username becomes available via Discord and/or e-mail (1 username)

ruby.customImage: Ability to add a custom image on your Server page
ruby.serverDescription: Server description character limit bump to 1,500 characters (instead of 500)
ruby.moreTags: Add up to 9 tags on your Server (instead of 5)
ruby.access: Special Ruby access on Crafty's Discord
ruby.serverTracking: Access to 2 Minecraft server tracking slots
ruby.notifications: Receive notification when Minecraft username becomes available via Discord and/or e-mail (3 username)

diamond.earlyAccess: Early Access to our features, where you can provide feedback
diamond.access: Special Diamond access on Crafty's Discord
diamond.removeUpvote: Remove all upvote requirements and cooldowns for all users in a Discord server
diamond.serverTracking: Access to 3 Minecraft server tracking slots
diamond.notifications: Receive notification when Minecraft username becomes available via Discord and/or e-mail (8 username)

futureFeatures.header: By subscribing, you support the development of Crafty
futureFeatures.subheader: Here's a list of features we plan to introduce in the future
futureFeatures.playerStatisticsInformation: Get Minecraft player statistics across multiple popular Minecraft servers, all-in-one. This tool is already under development and is used by Crafty bot
futureFeatures.richTextEditorInformation: Right now you can only use Markdown for your server's description, we plan to change this with a feature rich text editor to help you create the best description for your server
futureFeatures.serverAnalyticsInformation: Analytics for server owners for better insights
futureFeatures.skinEditorInformation: Feature rich skin editor for you to create your next best skin freely and with ease
futureFeatures.notificationsInformation: Receive useful notifications (if you opt in) when your server goes offline, when a Minecraft username is available, when a new Minecraft version or article is out, and more!
futureFeatures.yourSuggestionInformation: Η ιδέα σας θα μπορούσε να είναι εδώ. Μπείτε στο Discord μας και ενημερώστε μας για το τι θα θέλατε να δείτε ή να συμπληρώσετε τη φόρμα στη σελίδα σχολίων
